Sentencas: Atmospheric plasma spraying is regarded as one of the most promising processing methods for the production of solid oxide fuel cells (SOFCs) because of its fast deposition rate and cost-effective characteristic compared with other film formation processes.
Titulo: Effect of composition of NiO/YSZ anode on the polarization characteristics of SOFC fabricated by atmospheric plasma spraying

Sentencas: Thermally sprayed ceramic deposits are characterized by lamellar structure resulting from the insufficient filling and incomplete wetting of molten liquid on previously formed rough coating surfaces.
Titulo: Effect of composition of NiO/YSZ anode on the polarization characteristics of SOFC fabricated by atmospheric plasma spraying

Sentencas: There are large voids (especially larger than 10 pm), nonbonded interface, and vertical cracks (in particular, in individual ceramic lamella which are in the sub-micrometer size range).

Sentencas: The bonding at the interface between flattened particles is much less than the apparent total interface area.

Sentencas: The microstructure of plasma-sprayed coating can be significantly influenced by the feedstock.

Sentencas: In this paper, a Ni-Al2O3 cermet supported tubular SOFC cell with three different anodes was fabricated by thermal spraying.

Sentencas: The effect of the anode microstructure on the performance of SOFC was investigated.
